item.description:
I was riding with my sister and as we passed the Met Bar she remembered this is a place she's been meaning to check out. So, I thought I'd add it to our schedule after reading about their Sunset Hour.

From 4:30 until 6:30, Met Bar offers appetizer specials, which are $4 and cocktails for $6. I'll let you know whether they have draft specials. There's comfortable seating and even a fireplace to warm us. So, join us for drinks and apps.

Met Bar Website

Get there when you're able and hang as long as you can, but if you want to save some dough get there between 4:30 and 6:30 for the specials.

If the AMC theatre across the street is still showing Gran Torino, I'll be heading over there afterward, which should be around 7:30.

Don't be shy ...Say hi. I'll buy a drink for the first new member who finds me. I'll be wearing a purple vneck sweater.

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route


five minute walk from

Green Line (D) Chestnut Hill Station (FYI...this train ends at Riverside)



PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the bar wearing a purple vneck sweater
item.name: Let's Drink Up While the Sun Goes Down on March 3rd
